location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 11 August and approving of Bruce leaving for Shiraz, where he is to settle the accounts of Mahomed Nebby Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire].
